name: Eskimo Wars
description:
This is a multiplayer game. You need two players and two console controllers. How to play:

Use the arrows to move.

Use R1 and L1 to rotate your shield and your aim.

Use the shield to reflect the beams and defend yourself or attack your opponent.

Use the circle button (PS4) or B (Xbox) to shoot.

This game was brought to you by:

Diogo Pereira 

Inês Merino

Beatriz Abreu

José Ribeiro

BONUS:

Here's a little Eskimo!
